items: Updated the global base exposure areaParameters
Increase skylight alpha to fit new base exposure
Transitions from other weather states should no longer result in 'flashbangs'
Reduced intensity of state particles
Increased volumetric fog absorption
Reduced cloud shadows at night
Increased skylight brightness at night
New important notice banner added to changelog window
Moved debug export button to botton of main GUI (please use it!)
Moved exported debug files to debug folder
New debug description popup window to attach additional info
Added motion blur scale slider (only visible when blur enabled)
Highlight current hour in time slider window
Add CET hotkey bindings for weather/time randomization
Resolution preset styling updates
Fixed missing popstyles
Adjusted general weather probabilities
Reduced clear weather state probabilities
Increased rain/fog state probabilities
Track previous weather state and export in debug
Added weather state history to debug export (up to 10)
Add changelog popup to show newest updates (you're lookin' at it)
Randomized time and weather buttons
Fixed mislabeled and missing settings flags
Disable auto-apply on weather reset
Debug export formatting for player direction and position
Minor toggle timers changes to avoid CTD
Remove unpause trigger when closing CET overlay
GUI refresh. New look, new features!
User settings should now properly load and save without crashing.
Move CTD-prone toggles under advanced settings.
Previous version settings are backed up when updating to newer versions.
Added auto-apply weather toggle.
Adjusted exposure in vehicle FPP.
Overall skylight brightness and saturation tweaks.
Add new overcast light state to rotation
Fixed broken transitions between certain states/ adjusted probability.
Included the previously misspelled backup ini file (blank) to override previous versions
OVERCAST-LIGHT: Lighter version of the overcast state, closer to 1.6.0.
Removed conflicting backup ini file.
Reverted to standard toggle menu format. Does not load or save toggle settings.
Rearranged toggles and adjusted GUI formatting.
Removed several ini params.
Fixed broken notification toggles.
Added debug export button (use this to generate a debug file when you run into issues)
Made toggle states save their states and added a defaults button.
Fixed broken loadSettings function that caused message popups to reenable when opening CET menu.
Adjusted transition duration and probabilities and updated master env version.
Remove broken rain effect and replaced it with new variant.
Adjusted volumetric lighting, exposure, and clouds.
Reduced wind.
Now loads weather states from json file for easier localization and player customization.
Added collapsible category headers and added new categories.
New colored reset button and other formatting updates.
Added search bar to CET menu with keyword search.
Debug toggle.
Restored vanilla values for global illumination and actually saved them this time.
Removed unused weather states from the master env, bumping master version to v003.
Restored default global illumination areaParameters to fix lighting in non-PT modes.
Fixed (hopefully) Nova City Tools CET menu buttons to effectively activate weather states.
Dynamic resolution presets to fit various displays.
Cleaned up weather states, removing duplicate area parameters.
Switched to custom env master and modified streaming world to avoid conflicts.
Extended night duration. Nights now start getting dark at 7pm are darker until 5am (for most states).
More exposure & auto exposure adjustments (should fix overexposure when driving in first person).
Fixed simple density fog that caused mirrors to look grey.
Rain card brightness reduced.
Changed moon texture.
Custom weather effects for more states.
Probability and transition adjustments between states.
Selected weather states now show active button color.
Added new toggles tab.
Automatically toggle DLSSDSeparateParticleColor depending on state.
Added current weather state and mode status to the GUI.
Added misc settings tab with time of day / time scale slider.
Transition duration presets.
Added weather state notifications and toggles.
Added CET hotkeys to control timescale.
Added CET hotkey to toggle HDR.
Sort weather buttons alphabetically.
Fixed auto exposure when in vehicles.
Fine tuned exposure threshold for a moodier look.
Skylight adjustments.
Cirrus cloud exposure and color changes.
Reduced exposure at noon.
Complete lighting overhaul, exposure changes, custom rain, fog density increase.
Fog density adjustments, exposure changes.
Exposure changes.
Exposure changes, new rain, sky color changes.
New particles. Fixed volfog density. Cloud adjustments and sky light reduction.
Reduced fog intensity
Reduce exposure levels at night
Increase cloud density
Vol fog absorption lowered
Distant fog pushed back
Night exposure adjustments, volumetric fog increase at night.
Reduced afternoon exposure, increased cloud density, reduced evening cloud ambient light.
ARID: Added the early stages of a new weather state.
MUGGY: Added the early stages of a new weather state.
Updated CET addon weather states and added all current states to the dropdown menu.
Reorganized the weather states and added new 'Creative' states category that aren't included in rotation.
Overhauled particles. New, unique particles for various states.
Fixed fogHeightFalloff for some states which had been causing rain card masking issues.
Added new light rain / mist particles.
Adjusted rain intensity parameters.
Added heat haze particles (WIP).
Adjusted particle intensity.
Reduced moon glow.
Minor cloud changes.
Reduced lens flares at night.
Fixed this state! Finally working as intended.
New custom rain particles.
Adjusted rain parameters for more visible ground drops.
DISTANT STORM: Added the early stages of a new weather state (a heavy WIP).
DENSE CLOUDS: Added the early stages of a new weather state based on Courier Clouds.
DRIZZLE HEAVY: Added the early stages of a new weather state (a heavy WIP).
DOWNPOUR: Added the early stages of a new weather state (particles WIP).
BLACKOUT: Added new creative weather state that is always night.
Exposure & auto exposure adjustments to light clouds, cloudy, heavy clouds, overcast, windy, smog, and drizzle.
Fixed (hopefully) wind particles so they will no longer appear indoors.
Added new particle textures.
New rain particle/effects.
Exposure & auto exposure adjustments to bright weather states (should fix sun blindness when driving in first person).
Light shaft intensity increased.
Reduce sunset intensity.
Stopped cirrus clouds from floating off into space during transitions.
New cirrus cloud texture to reduce tiling.
Reduced rain drop intensity on surfaces in some weather states.
Reverted sunny weather min exposure (accidentally kept some test values in there -- whoops!).
Reduced surface moisture for hot dry states.
Removed grain, chromatic aberration and flares / boosted sharpening for the ultimate YouTuber look.
Fixed raindrops appearing without rain.
Fixed raindrops appearing without rain.
Adjusted wind strength.
Fixed particles.
Reduced surface moisture in the evening.
Reduced surface moisture overall.
Slight blur increase.
Reduced skydome color during dawn and dusk.
Adjusted sky exposure impact.
Adjusted rain intensity curve.
Adjusted cloud ambient intensity and cloud density/coverage in the afternoon.
Minor lighting adjustments to exposure and sun light intensity.
Overhauled rain intensity curve.
Forced volumetric clouds.
Renamed the archive: DELETE YOUR OLD ONE!
Removed Lighting state from the CET tool (it was broken anyway).
Removed DLSS/RT entries from the INI to avoid issues with certain hardware.
Increased skydome brightness in the afternoon.
Adjusted exposure center importance.
Initial beta release.
